name: North East Rover (4 in 8 or 7 days)
description:
NORTH EAST ROVER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for any 4 days in 8 days or 7 consecutive days. It extends from Berwick-upon-Tweed in the north to Sheffield, Retford and Gainsborough in the south and from Carlisle and Huddersfield in the west to Whitby, 
      Scarborough, Hull and Cleethorpes in the east. Scenic and coastal lines include the Settle & Carlisle line, the Tyne Valley line between Carlisle and Newcastle and the Yorkshire Wolds 
      Coast line between Hull and Scarborough. You can travel 149 miles from Carlisle to Cleethorpes and 175 miles along the East Coast Main Line between Berwick-upon-Tweed and Retford. The North East Rover is now available to buy online

fares_and_restrictions.raw: fares & restrictions New fares from 2nd Mar 2025 Any 4 days in 8 adult: £132.70 child (5-15): £66.35 16-17 saver: £66.35 railcards ⯆ 16 26 SE DI 2T FF H V : £88.35 FF H V child fare: £25.20 7 consecutive days adult: £152.40 child (5-15): £76.20 16-17 saver: £76.20 railcards ⯆ 16 26 SE DI 2T FF H V : £101.45 FF H V child fare: £28.95 Railcards ⯈ Railcards: 16 = 16-25 26 = 26-30 SE = Senior DI = Disabled 2T = Two Together FF = Family & Friends H = HM Forces V = Veterans Previous fares ⯈ Previous fares (adult) 4 in 8 days: 2024 - £126.90 2023 - £120.90 2022 - £114.20 2021 - £107.20 2020 - £107.20 2019 - £104.20 2018 - £101.00 2014 - £92.00 2011 - £79.00 7 days: 2024 - £145.70 2023 - £138.80 2022 - £131.10 2021 - £123.10 2020 - £123.10 2019 - £119.70 2018 - £116.00 2014 - £106.00 2011 - £92.00 time restrictions Mon to Fri: valid from 09:00 but 2T railcard not valid until 09:30 No restrictions at weekends or bank holidays route restrictions Not valid on Grand Central or Hull Trains train operating companies CrossCountry, East Midlans Railway, London North Eastern Railway, Lumo, Northern, TransPennine Express purchasing ONLINE : ✔ Train conductor: ✔ * Station ticket office: ✔ Ticket Vending Machine: i Northern Ticket Vending Machines now sell most ranger and rover tickets but at the moment only for same-day travel (rather prohibitive for distant areas) Some Avanti West Coast station TVMs for example Crewe, now sell local rangers and rovers. LNER TVMs at Doncaster, Edinburgh, London King's Cross, Newcastle and York also sell them. A number of PTE areas sell local rangers from TVMs in their area e.g. South Yorkshire, Strathclyde and West Midlands * valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities

stations: Hutton Cranswick Ilkley James Cook University Hospital Keighley
